reviews.review_msg: Joel is an incredible professor; he's fairly new but can still amazingly deliver his content. He sets clear expectations, and his classes are usually more discussion-based than lecture-based. I only wish he were a bit clearer on how he presents his material, as it can get hard to understand. Other than that, I would highly recommend his class!

Really fun professor, made the lectures really engaging and had very clear expectations and deliverables. His choice of media was well thought out and presented a fair bit of variety and the tests were fairly easy and straightforward providing a lot of leeway. However his tutorials sometimes felt like they dragged on slightly too much.
